SEARCH
Package beans

Class VerificationBean

java.lang.Object
beans.VerificationBean
@Named("verificationBean") @RequestScoped public class VerificationBean extends Object
Managed bean for handling email verification processes. This bean is responsible for verifying user email addresses using a token and providing feedback to the user about the verification status.
Author:
Davide Scaccia - xscaccd00

  • Method Details

    • verifyEmail

      public String verifyEmail()
      Verifies the user's email using the provided token. If the token is valid, the user's email gets verified, and a success message is displayed. If the token is invalid or expired, an error message is displayed.
      Returns:
      a navigation outcome string, or null if verification fails

    • addMessage

      private void addMessage(jakarta.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity severity, String summary, String detail)
      Adds a message to the JSF context.
      Parameters:
      severity - the severity of the message
      summary - a brief summary of the message
      detail - detailed information about the message
